stateMachine

Class StateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • stateMachine.StateManager

  • public class StateManager
extends java.lang.Object
    StateManager class is a singleton... Once this object is created it will continue its life until the GameEngine Object it was passed through finishes. The stateManager cycles in the following sequence... SetUpState, PlayState, ResultState Each state updates the statemanager when it is ready to do so.
    Author:
    mike

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        This method initiates the stateManager and creates a new setUpState object. The newly created SetUpState Object becomes the statemanager's current gameState
